title: Homie
description:
Introducing Homie: Your Ultimate Cashback App in the UAE

Homie is the premier cashback platform designed to redefine the way you spend and save across the UAE. With a focus on simplicity, convenience, and incredible rewards, Homie makes it effortless to earn cashback on your everyday spendings.

How Homie Works:
When you visit any of our partnered merchants in:

Dine-in: Fine dining restaurants, casual eateries, fast-food joints, and cafes
Entertainment: Cinemas, theme parks, tourism attractions, and leisure activities
Lifestyle: Salons, spas, fitness centers, and fashion boutiques
Online: Fashion, Retail, Beauty, Electronics, Health and much more
 
Simply ask for the bill when you're done with your purchase, inform the merchant you'll be paying through Homie, and follow these simple steps:

Open the app and select the respective merchant.
Enter the bill amount in the payment section.
Complete the transaction effortlessly.

Homie instantly calculates your cashback and credits it directly to your in-app wallet. Track your savings with ease and enjoy the rewards you deserve!

Why Choose Homie?
1. Uncapped Cashback Rewards
With Homie, there are no limits to your savings. For example, spend 1,000 Dirhams and earn a 20% cashback—instantly receiving 200 Dirhams in your wallet. The more you spend, the more you save!
2. Instant Withdrawal Options
Access your cashback whenever you need it.
Navigate to the wallet section in the app.
Choose the withdrawal option and your preferred withdrawal method.
Enjoy instant transfers with funds reflecting directly in your bank account.
3. No Hidden Costs
Homie is built on transparency. There are no hidden fees or onboarding charges for users or merchants. Your cashback earnings are entirely yours to use without additional costs.
4. Flexible Cashback Usage
Withdraw your cashback to your bank account and enjoy full control over your funds. Use them for everyday expenses, savings, or treating yourself—it’s your choice.
5. Generous Cashback Rates
Earn cashback ranging from 15% to an impressive 60% across our partnered merchants. Whether you're dining out, visiting entertainment venues, or indulging in lifestyle services, Homie ensures your purchases are rewarding.

Why Homie?
Homie offers a user-friendly interface, instant rewards, and unparalleled flexibility. We’ve partnered with top merchants across the UAE to provide you with the best cashback deals.
Download Homie today and start maximizing your savings with every transaction!
